** UNDER CONTRACT **
CRANBOURNE - Boasting a huge 18sq open living floor plan with a great sized outdoor decking area which has been recently restained, you've plenty of room to create, develop or improve this fabulous, solid brick veneer home in the heart of Cranbourne. This is a securely fenced 604sqm block with a large shed/workshop space at the rear of the property, together with off-street parking for up to four cars, you won't want to miss out on purchasing this great investment. First home buyer? You'll love what you can imagine and create. Investor? You'll love the fact you can buy today and have a tenant in there tomorrow, generating an instant return on your investment! This one-owner built and owned home has been lovingly cared for over the years and has kept open plan living in mind. Three generous sized bedrooms all with BIR's, master with full en suite, split system heating/cooling and WIR. The main feature of this home is the open plan living area which includes a theatre space with wall size screen and projector accessories, sound absorbing ceiling, block out blinds as well as super comfy cinema chairs and surround sound for that authentic cinema experience; how many homes do you walk into these days that have an in-home cinema included in the price? The whole family will be entertained from the kids to everyone milling around on AFL Grand Final day to watch the footy on the massive screen. Family bathroom with spa bath, separate shower and vanity, spacious laundry and separate toilet. The spacious and fully updated kitchen/meals area is so inviting, like a country kitchen of years gone by, you'll be gathering around the table, engrossed in conversations whilst waiting for the family meal to be prepared, or better still get involved, because there's so much room for more than one cook in this kitchen! Leading from the kitchen/meals or the theatre space to the outside decked area, you could set up a bbq, add a shade cloth or cantilever umbrella and you have the perfect entertaining area for family and friends and watch the backyard game of cricket, bocce or footy from you own private balcony. You'll love everything this home has to offer, spacious and open floor plan, up to date inclusions and a simply brilliant location with loads of potential, even (STCA) to subdivide and add another dwelling at the rear of the property or a Granny Flat for the extended family. Close to all that Cranbourne has to offer including, primary/secondary schools, childcare centres, shopping centres, public transport, medical and dental surgeries, local strip shopping which has the best fish and chips takeaway (according to local feedback), a top little bakery and milk bar and if you're feeling adventurous, a top tattoo parlour. This property truly does offer the one stop location for the astute buyer.

The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within walking distance to all facilities, including the newly renovated Cranbourne Park, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.
